title: Auto-fill forms
content:

I read the help guide does the instructions have no results.

title: Previews / Images not displaying in URL links in Facebook posts
content:
Hi all,

Previews / Images have stopped being displayed when posting URL links to Facebook Pages & Groups Happens on ' ALL ' website URL's posted , no matter the website. This ' continues ' ... even AFTER doing a full un-install & then re-install of Firefox v99 Problem is NOT manifesting on any other browsers ie. Chrome / Edge

Never been a problem before , but now copies link address as if it is just text & not an active link.

Desperate to solve this Firefox / Facebook issue . . . if anyone can help ??
creator: prophecynewsdesk

title: Right-Click Select All disappeared in later versions of Firefox
content: I've been using Firefox 78ESR for Mac for quite some time, but finally decided to upgrade to stable release Firefox 99. What I discovered is that when I'm on a webpage and right-click and click on "select all" to copy all of the text, the text does not get copied. I have found this on websites and especially in blogger. I'm wondering if there's some setting I'm not aware of, or if Mozilla just completely did away with that ability.
creator: soofeenee2

title: Will there be a generic icon for websites without favicons?
content:
I don't know if this is a problem with my installation, but websites without specific favicons (e.g.: https://forum.librivox.org/index.php?sid=fd7dca1ba59c207dd25121695677d565) don't have a placeholder icon in the tab. Is this intended behavior? There's the globe icon for bookmarks without favicons, couldn't that be used if a website doesn't have one? I think that would contribute to some visual consistency :)

I have looked across various support forums for information on this, I only see posts regarding favicons and bookmarks, not the tab itself, so apologies if this has been asked and answered already!
creator: pcannon424

title: Gmail times out
content: Hello, in the past week at least 10 of my users have had issues with Gmail timing out in Firefox on Windows 10. We cleared cache/cookies, uninstalled/reinstalled, and updated both Dell and Windows. The error message states "reconnecting in 10s" but never reconnects. At first glance, it appears the users are having network issues. However, Gmail in Chrome doesn't present this issue. Please advise. Thank you.
creator: penwhitehatethicalhacker

title: can't get to hmnow.com; all I get is white screen
content: When I try to log on to hmnow.com, all I get is a white screen. I worked with Hallmark support, but they couldn't figure it out even though I have a paid subscription with them. I've rebooted my Mac and it says I have the latest Firefox version installed. This has gone on for weeks. I've had no problem with any other website.
creator: cd.kje
